content.detailedDescription: While archery hunting i often look to the sky to relax my eyes from the intensity of looking through binoculars. on this day while gazing into the southern sky a bright flash appeared at about a 60 degree angle. the flash lasted approximately 1.5 to 2 seconds and was the size of a pea. not far from my location is a small airport that the air guard uses, so immediately i assumed it was one of their c-140's that often fly near the farm. i continued to watch that location expecting to see the military aircraft but saw nothing just empty sky. this struck me as odd because the brightness of the light indicated to me that if it had been from the c-140 i would have seen the airplane. i continued to scan the location, hoping to see something to explain the flash, but saw nothing. because there was nothing to explain the flash i thought it could be possible that it was just a physiological dysfunction. however within a week while walking the same farm, in the northern sky this time, i witnessed the same exact flash. again i searched for something to explain the incident and again nothing but clear sky. it is very odd, because as close as the flashes appeared to be, if it had been a conventional aircraft, i would have seen it.
content.summary: A bright flash in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:30 am on 10/3/08. i was spproaching service drive going toward us 23 north off of carpenter rd in milan. i was headed toward ann arbor. while going around the loop, something made me look over my left shoulder in an upward direction. sky was clear blue with full sun shining reflecting off of the silver object hovering in the southwest. the entire object was silver. i was amazed in wonderment as to how beautiful it was. it was approx 100 ft above the ground in the plank rd area. it was rectangular in length- about as long as the goodyear blimp and had square segments similar to a plastic pill box. there was no traffic, and i kept driving off onto the shoulder because i kept looking back at it. this happened 2 times, and when i got back on the road, i looked back again and it was gone. the segment lines were clearly defined, and the silver object glistened in the sunshine. absolutely stunning. i have never seen anything like this. although i was moving, it appeared to be hovering. the outline of the object was clear against the blue sky. what was even more strange is that i immediately forgot the sighting until a friend of mine mentioned a ufo sighting up north. this was that evening. there was no "missing time". i went about my business the rest of the day. i drove the same route the next day and there was nothing in the sky. i was wondering if those segments would separate and take off!
content.summary: Object suspended in mid air, hovering

content.detailedDescription:
3 more ufo's spotted on october 7- newport rhode island next to a plane flying just offshore

right click and zoom five times for max zoom

view the latest update at
http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: 3 more ufo's spotted on october 7- newport rhode island

content.detailedDescription: Last fall- 2007, the local news announced that the space shuttle could be seen at 10:30 pm in the southern sky. i lived in ypsilanti. at 10:30 pm, i went out to my back porch. the sky was clear and cold. i was waiting to see the space shuttle. after 1 min, a rectangular shaped object appeared from behind my tree in the back yard and moved over the tree top in a northerly direction and passed directly above me (10 ft). it was approx 10feet long and 3 feet wide. it was grey and sounded like an "electrical" hum as it passed over. i looked up and saw port holes on the underside. obviously, this was not the space shuttle. i thought this was the shuttle, but learned recently that the shuttle was traveling thousands of miles above the earth. for a year, i thought i saw the space shuttle. it was a shuttle, i'm sure, but not from here. i remember it so vividly. i was thrilled when i saw it and didn't give it another thought. i went back into the house thinking i saw the nasa shuttle, up close.
content.summary: Object passing over tree top and 10 ft above me

content.detailedDescription: While i was driving to work during the middle of the first full week of march i was driving past wild waters on silver springs bulevard. i noticed a strange object in the distance. it was muggy outside and the sky around the city had an orange hue reflecting the streetlights from the moisture in the air. looking at the object, i noticed that even thoug it was so humid outside, the object was a perfect triangle (three 60 degree angles) and it had three glowing lights near the corners ofthe triangle. although it had three lights glowing on the object, there was no illumination of the triangle. it was all black besides those lights. it was floating lazily twards the local airport. it had no flashing or landing lights. i saw it for approximately three minutes until the tree line obscured the object and i arrived at work. i felt a little nervous at the time but more of amazement than fear. i was going to write in sooner but was afraid to be ridiculed, but witholding the sighting i realized made me part of the problem than the solution.
content.summary: Triangle hovering around ocala

content.detailedDescription:
I looked up at the sky last night and was surprised at to how clear a view i was getting of so many stars.

i had hear about ufos becoming more apparent as october 14th approaches. so i decided to scan the sky (i live among an industrial area, so alot of my view of the sky is blocked) 

so from the point that i looked... (towards east of la) there was a star like object. if i had not kep on looking at it, it could very easily be confused for a regular star.

but if you look at it intently, you would notice that there were colored lights coming from it. it looked like it was flickering.

then i saw it moving up, down, side too side (it was too far and it moved too fast for it to have been an airplane or helicpoter.) 

also, it was shooting out smaller star like objects. these object would shoot out... like shooting stars through the sky.

these smaller object would come in and out of the bigger and colorful object. ( the smaller ones wer just white)

i had to call my husband out to check it out. and though he has vision problems... and almost never sees what i see in the sky, this time he saw it too. 

i plan on borrowing a camera and filming this stuff.
content.summary: Bright lights over los angeles

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home when i saw a bright star i kept staring at it and it was moving slow i knew it wasn't a plane because there was no blinking light or sound it wasn't to far away but wasn't close either i've never seen anything like it.  it was moving south then went south west and i couldn't see it anymore.  it had no smoke trail like a jet or sound it looked like a big star just cruising.
content.summary: Moving star

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in the student parking lot directly east of mcallen high school in mcallen, texas (longitude: 98���14'13.94"w, latitude  26���13'36.17"n), i was talking on my cell phone and happened to glance up at the sky. it was a bright, sunny, mostly clear day with hardly a cloud in the sky. i observed two bright, shiny "dots" flying in very close formation almost directly overhead but slightly west of my position. i can only describe them as "dots," seemingly circular in shape and very small in the sky from my vantage point. i could not tell if their bright appearance was due to reflection from the bright sun or an internal illumination.

the objects were moving due west and, as they flew, they came very close together and then separated from each other several times (2 or 3 times). at one point, they seemed to almost touch, but then they separated, as they continued their track across the sky.

suddenly, both objects came to a complete stop in the sky and remained "frozen" for several moments before reversing their direction and heading back to the east. as they headed east, they began to appear smaller and more faint, which to me indicated that their altitude was increasing.

i ran inside mcallen high school to get a friend of mine to come out and witness the objects, but he was not in his office. when i went back outside, the objects were so faint that they were barely visible. moments later, when i finally contacted my friend, they were no longer visible.

i have never had a "ufo sighting" in my life and was extremely shocked to observe what i observed. the fact that the two objects came to a complete stop in the sky for several moments and then reversed their direction indicates to me that these were not conventional aircraft.

i am a computer specialist for the mcallen independent school district and, due to the politics of my job, prefer to remain anonymous.
content.summary: 2 bright "dots" traveling together came to complete stop and later zoomed up.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister were sitting on back porch when i noticed light coming over neihbors roof.The object was moving south to north at about 300 mph.Strange red and blue laser type lights extended about 10 to fifteen feet below craft and stopped.There was no yellow light but was a flashing light close to laser lights but was not yellow. craft came about one quater of mile form going overhead.There was no sound.Craft seemed to have round shape about 20 feet in diameter.After going over house 2 minutes later it appeared going east to west.Im fimiar with most aircraft and this was strange espicially with no sound.My chair just happened to be facing south and i picked up objest after it came over neihbors roof.I felt that i had seen a real ufo by definition.Me and my sister talked about sighting for 30 minutes and went to bed.I thought about event for 10 or 15 minutes before i went to sleep.It could have been someone trying to do a hoax but there was no sound.Wish i had it in video.Would like to know who else say it and what they think.
content.summary: Object appeared to be at 3 to 5 thousand feet .Six red and blue laser type lights,no yellow. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going south on county road 37 at 8:00 p.M. approaching hwy 392 when i saw a big bright green object coming out of the east at an unbelievable speed.  thought it was going to crash but the trees at 392 blocked my view.  after i lost sight of the object i looked at my watch and it was 8:10 p.M.  once i got on 392 it was gone.  i thought it crashed, went back the next day but could not see a thing.  i thought when i first saw the object it was a meteorite because it was large, round and bright green.

i ran the stop sign at 392 because i was watching it till it ran out of sight behind the trees on 392.  i was scared becausse i was not sure what the object was and at how fast it was coming.

reported the incident to mike peters at the greeley tribune.  he went to invest the incident.  he went to the greeley airport and the national guard.  mike peters said someone had seen the same thing i did about an hour later but this time the object was moving slow.
content.summary: Bright green and round and very large

content.detailedDescription: On thursday morning, october 9, 2008, i had just taken my granddaughter to school and was returning to my car.  i glanced up to the sky in the west, and (i'm still shaking, i was so excited) observed a huge silver cylinderical ship slowly gliding toward the north that looked somewhat like a huge jumbo jet with no tail, no wings, and no sound!  i watched for about 5 minutes (making a total fool of myself, i'm sure, standing there looking up toward the object in full view of the public) as it descended behind the trees headed northward, when my view became obscured.  i got into the car and headed toward home, just 4 or 5 blocks from the school, where i observed several people getting in a stationwagon and 4 workmen (building a house), looking upward and pointing to the sky.  i'm reasonably sure they saw the ship also. may i assure you that i am of sound mind, a grandmother of normal intelligence, and an unidentified object was the absolute last thing on my mind when i observed this incident.
content.summary: Slowly gliding well over the treetops of western fayetteville, ar

content.detailedDescription: On thursday morning, october 9, 2008, i had just taken my granddaughter to school and was returning to my car.  i glanced up to the sky in the west, and (i'm still shaking, i was so excited) observed a huge silver cylinderical ship slowly gliding toward the north that looked somewhat like a huge jumbo jet with no tail, no wings, and no sound!  i watched for about 5 minutes (making a total fool of myself, i'm sure, standing there looking up toward the object in full view of the public) as it descended behind the trees headed northward, when my view became obscured.  i got into the car and headed toward home, just 4 or 5 blocks from the school, where i observed several people getting in a stationwagon and 4 workmen (building a house), looking upward and pointing to the sky.  i'm reasonably sure they saw the ship also. may i assure you that i am of sound mind, a grandmother of normal intelligence, and an unidentified object was the absolute last thing on my mind when i observed this incident.
content.summary: Slowly gliding well over the treetops of western fayetteville, ar

content.detailedDescription: 9:00 in the morning i was on my email, when my son and daughter ran in from the back porch saying they saw a kite.  they routinely look in the sky and we watch planes and helicopters and they are excited by that. i started asking what kind of kite and they said at first it was a circle, then a ball. i immediately became curious. i started drawing shapes on a piece of paper like a triangular kite. and he said no. i drew a circle and he said no, then i drew a sphere and shaded a side of it, and my son said it looked like the sphere i drew.  i asked what  color it was and they started naming all of them.  i then thought if this is shiny they might be seeing reflections.  i held up my cell phone which has a metallic looking casing and asked my son if that was the color, and he said yes.  he said it moved fast and slow.  but what i gathered was it moved steady across the sky.  he even told me exactly where his sister and he were standing and they both confirmed which way it went. i asked if it made a sound like a plane or helicopters, as we see those often where we live. they said no. in his own words, "we see airplanes and helicopters.  it was different."  they are 3 and a half years old and gave what i think is a pure description of what they saw.
content.summary: Son and daughter said they saw a "kite"

content.detailedDescription: These photos were posted on channel 6 abc's web site today, thursday october 9th. they were taken during a free bruce springsteen concert on saturday, oct. 4th in philadelphia during a barak obama rally.
content.summary: I found these photos on line today. more information is below.

content.detailedDescription: I had been watching this flashing star for two weeks since my mom told me about it. every few days more and more become apparent. last week i looked through my telescope at the only one noticeable. it was oval and emitted 3 colors. it's center was dim, but the outside..White light like a halo. now, 10/8/2008, there are like 15 of them. and the brightest one has many more colors, which i believe is cause it's closer now. i look through the telescope now and i am am [pd] astonished. the colors are moving around in circles around this oval. and the inside of the oval looks like the white fuzz on a tv without signal, and almost like a bullseye more prominent over the fuzz. at 8:25 pm or so, it moved to the left and then downward. it disappeared shortly then hovered back what seemed to be upward with the white lights off...Yet still very colorful blinks of light. question 6.. says how did i lose sight of the object. i lose sight when the sun oves out. but they get closer everyday. it's 3:26 and they're out there now. i showed my co-worker and before he thought i was just being as he would say "retarded". he seen it and all the rest and he sure can't come up with an explination. my mom as well researched this. she believes that this is not the star sirius as i've read in other blogs and debunking forums.
content.summary: Flashing star moved horizontally, then downward. turned off white lights and hovered back up.

content.detailedDescription: The light was bright in the sky. moving not fast and side to side going south east. the light became brighter for 2 sec then faded out. i thought it was a meteor, but i didnt see any trail or tail like others i seen. it lasted 15 sec. looking for more i saw another one going south. same thing a steady light no strobe. became brighter then fade to nothing. i live 6miles from luke afb and know the flight path of sky harbor. these were not planes. there is a bright half moon. the sky was lit up good. not many stars were seen. i dont think it was a satelight. wonder it there any meteor showers going on?
content.summary: Light with no strobe moving sw with a slite zig zag to it.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 3:30am and i woke up to get something to drink and make sure my back porch doorwall was locked.  i looked to the southwest and these multi-colored lights caught my attention.  i live under the dtw flight path but there were no flights at that hour of the night.  i watched it for about 5 minutes when i decided to wake my wife up who also witnessed the lights for about 5 minutes.  our digital camera was sitting out so i decided to film about 10 minutes of the lights.  when i first observed it was lower in the sky with the tree that can be seen in the video.  when i started filming they had moved higher in the sky.  as the video shows there was no sound coming from it and it was the brightest object in the sky.  what the camera didn't pick up and that i observed were two lights that was circle around from left to right.  after about 20 minutes of watching this object i finally went to bed because i had to get up for work in a few hours.  i wasn't scared because i knew it was a distance away.
content.summary: Unusual multi-colored light observed from redford twp.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog out around 11:38 p.M. when i noticed 3 bright lights tracking from right to left across the sky.

the three lights seemed to be in a triangular formation and were moving incredibly fast with no sound; no jet engines, no props, no rotors.

the object had no running lights, only 3 constant white lights, and was certainly flying well below the cloud ceiling.

i would estimate the flying height of the object to be 4,000 to 5,000 feet up.

the object moved across my field of view, across the top of the treeline from right to left, in about 6-7 seconds.
content.summary: 3 white lights moving incredibly fast from right to left with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I don't tell this very often since no-one believes me anyway, but i think it was 1976 near where i live now which is near some old mine pits, i was on the golf course with my girlfriend when i heard a noise sounded kinda like a motor whine which drew my attention to a pump station which was nearby at which time we saw coming over the trees the most awsome site i have ever seen. a flying saucer ? it was round, it was metallic colored and it did have light panels however i could not see inside or did not see any markings on the vessel. i did not see any exhaust and am not sure if the sound i heard had anything to do with the ufo or if it was the pump kicking in which just caught our attention. i did not notice a sound as it came over us and it was so low it was scary. it did not spin and i did not see legs hanging down or anything like that. my only saving grace is that my best friend had a sister working at the radio station here in town and when i told him the story her laughed then said that he guess it isn't that funny afterall, that alot of calls came in that night about a ufo siting. anyway, i don't know if it was some nasa test craft or what, but i have yet to see anything else like it. i've never reported this since i didn't know how to go about it and also i really didn't want to be made into some nutcase like another ufo observer locally was. now that i'm older, i wanted to make sure someone knew that might actually care.
thank you

my other witness i no longer see, but i can contact if need be. she's married and in another state. i emailed her a couple years ago about this and she said hardly a day goes by that she doesn't think about it.
content.summary: Metallic object came over our head very close

content.detailedDescription: Flew over
content.summary: Ufo flew over

content.detailedDescription: I have observed two separate ufo events during the day.  the first ufo occurred while i was traveling on i-25 heading north through denver/lakewood, co.  i have frequently noticed the interesting contrails being made by aircraft that are significantly different from the normal aircraft contrails. the contrails tend to stick around for up to 10 min and can be turned on/off in the cockpit of the aircraft. the second contrail was being made (see picture) and as the aircraft was finishing its run a bright sphere appeared.  it was at the same altitude as the aircraft contrail (~ fl 36, heading slightly north of west), and stayed in a position between the two contrails.  it went to bright white to a lesser bright white for 20 sec.  then appeared 5 degrees south of its original position and performed the same sequence of events. after observing the ufo for 2 min it disappeared. interestingly enough a very similar event occurred again into the same area at 1109 on 8 oct 2008. the contrails were being made again in the same area of the sky. i observed the ufo appear between the two contrails again. however the object was significantly bigger and cigar shaped. it appeared at 1109 and followed the contrailing aircraft for 3 min until 1112. it first stayed in about the same position then proceeded to follow the aircraft in a south westerly direction. it disappeared suddenly after this event.  this has been interesting as the ufo���s have been around the same alt (~fl360) and always seemed to be in the same spot.  the later observation ufo seemed to be ~twice the length of the aircraft, while the first ufo was ��� the length of the aircraft. i have many hours of flight experience and i know when it is not a normal aircraft, balloon, or biologic species. thanks for letting me share!
content.summary: Ufo's following contrails and aircraft making contrails; 2 events, same location

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work at 5;45 riding on rt. 44 east towards plymouth, through a clearing of trees i witnessed 5 fireball like objects, that were far more luminous than any other plane or star i have seen before, suspended(not moving) at different altitudes all relatively close to one another. my view of these objects was cut off by more trees as i drove further after about 7-8 seconds. there are radio towers through out the area, however i am positive that none are in this location as i have driven this route to work for the past 2 years. these objects were not like anything i have seen in the sky before.
content.summary: Five "fireballs" hovering at different altitudes about 1 mile from freeway

content.detailedDescription:
This is now the second night i've seen this, though it wasn't visible from the vantage point i had the night before.  this light appeared like a star just at dusk, and then slowly descended, then headed north very slowly, then straight down.  as it descended out of a cloud, the closer it got to the earth, the brighter it got.  it seemed like it wasn't moving, until i look at the pictures i took and you could see that indeed it was.  it was gold and green and pulsed like a heartbeat.  i have several pictures and will attach a few to show the movement.

nothing in the sky that is natural is that bright at night.  the moon and venus were to the left of my vantage point.  the view is taken from an overlook facing the front range from the daniels park area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Same bright light caught on film from day before

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i just moved from the city to the country a couple of months ago and ive been amazed by the view of the night sky out here. you dont see stars like this in the city. i smoke outside and at night spend the break-time looking up at the sky. 

since day one, there has been a brilliant star-like light thats always brighter than all the other stars that caught my eye. its always in a different location, but remains in the same general vacinity- to the right of the house or to the left of the house.. sometimes its a twinkling white light and sometimes its mixed with a shade of red ( but still always brighter than all the other stars ).  

a few weeks ago i noticed the light moving in a zig-zag pattern until it disappeared behind the tree-line. i rationalized that it was a weather-balloon.. a plane ( though no noise ). 

two weeks ago the light has become ( for lack of a better way of describing it ) vividly active.. moving rapidly across the sky ( sometimes in a zig-zag pattern ) then come to a sudden and complete stop. it always seems to be lower than all the other stars, but just high enough that it only looks like a light. im still rationalizing its some kind of weather-balloon.. a helicopter even though no sound. 

to be funny, one night last week i grabbed a flashlight and blinked the light in the direction of the object off and on for about 3 or 4 minutes. it seemed to have made no difference and it just sat there so i went into the house. about 30 minutes later i came out and it had moved directly across the door of the house where i was standing earlier. scared me to death.. i went in shut the door and decided i didnt want to know what it was or who it was anymore. 

over this past weekend, my husband has a police scanner he listens to and overheard a local lady calling in observing "my ufo". the dispatch has plugged her call in with the local police department and you could hear her reporting seeing the object in the same vacinity. she was crying.. her kids were crying in the background. finally.. someone else besides me has seen that light! the police dept. reported they called the local airports and said there is a blimp company starting up tours of the area and that is the object.

i had a hard time believing a blimp company was giving tours at 9:00 at night.. what can you see in the dark, but thought ok.. thats all it was. my ufo is a blimp. 

my usual routine of having a smoke-break out on the porch led me out off the porch .. a few feet out in the yard to look in the direction of the blimp and there it was.. moving towards me in a direct and deliberate way. for some reason, i was scared so i moved a couple of feet in towards the stairs of our deck to see if it would change its direction. i peeked back and it was still moving in my direction. i climbed about 5 steps and kept my view behind our roof-line to see if it would continue.. it stopped. i went back down the stairs to see what it would do next and it just appeared to be going up until it got smaller and smaller until it disappeared. 

that was no blimp!

i dont know what im seeing and ive debated about reporting it on here, but curiosity won on maybe others would report seeing it too thats in my area once someone else did. theres definately something other than rational explanations!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A brilliant light hovering then zig-zagging through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 9 pm on thurs sept 11, 2008 in warrington which is located in bucks county, pa. i was sitting on my recliner watching tv when i started hearing this loud rumbling noise. i figured it was a plane and didn't think much of it. after i heard the noise for several minutes i started to get a little concerned and got up to see what it was. at that same moment my wife came dowstairs and asked me if i heard the noise. after we both agreed on hearing it, we went outside on the front porch to see what it could be. we looked up in the sky and both were immediately surprised to see lots of white tiny blinking star like objects in a very confined area of the sky. my first immediate thought was that maybe we were getting attacked since it was 9/11. i knew it was definitely something that i had never seen before. the blinking lights were traveling at a high rate of speed almost like falling stars which made me think these were no airplanes. there was definitely too many lights in the same area to be airplanes. if i had to put a number on the objects that i saw, i would have to say around 10-20. we both stood there puzzeled for 5 minutes watching these lights, when to make things worse my wife looked over on the porch and pointed out a black cat about 5 feet away just sitting there staring at us. freaked out by this point, we both ran back in the house. after being inside the house and trying to figure out what it could be, i decided to call the willow grove navy base which is located not far from our home. a woman answered the phone and told us that they were testing planes in the area. i hung up the phone unconvinced and wondered several things.

1. why would the air base conduct such a test on sept.11 when they know that people's anxieties are already high to begin with? 

2. i have lived at this location for almost 10 years and have never experienced anything like this, so was this the first time they were ever conducting this test?

3. i am no pilot by any means, but how could atleast 10-20 airplanes be confined in such a small area of the sky at the same time, especially at night, and traveling at such fast speed and be able to avoid crashing?

a few minutes after hanging up the phone we went back outside. the loud rumbling noise was gone and the sky was completely empty. i can not say for sure what it was that i saw, but i can say it was definitely something that i had never witnessed before in my life.
content.summary: Many white tiny, star like, blinking objects traveling at high rates of speed in a very confined area of the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Went back to retake some images on location of ufo's on 9/11 and sure enough there was another one right on cue

much more at http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Another ufo shows up in newport ri

content.detailedDescription:
I was near the end of shooting about 300 photos of local autumn scenery and stopped at a friend's house to shoot the panoramic view of the moreno valley i knew could be seen from his main deck. while returning to my car, i noticed a flower pot on another small deck which juts out from the living room of his house about 12-15 feet above the driveway. the flowers hanging over the pot looked pretty against the bright blue cloudless sky, so i shot four pictures in a row of them, from about 20 feet away, using a telephoto lens. (the first shot was a "single;" the next three were a "burst.") the shots were aimed up toward the sky, slightly north, but mostly to the west. if there was any wind, i didn't notice it.

i noticed the object in photo one (of the four i shot of that scene) when quickly scanning through the photos as i transferred them from my camera to my computer. since i hadn't noticed anything in the sky when i shot the photo, i thought maybe the "object" resulted from a "glitch" in the camera. i made a copy of the photo at full size and enlarged it in photoshop, then enlarged the section with the object in it again and "enhanced" it using the photoshop unsharp mask filter at the following settings: amount-500; radius-25; threshold-15. in the enlarged enhanced view, the object appeared to be solid, and not the result of a camera malfunction. i checked and rechecked the other three photos of the same scene and found no trace of the object in any of them.

i mentally retraced my activities to determine the time when i shot the photo and then did test shots with the same camera to determine the amount of time which elapsed between the first and last photos in the scene (five seconds). 
   
i emailed copies of both the original photo and the enhanced enlargement of the object in the photo to folks i know in the ufo community asking for opinions. one person emailed back recommending i report to mufon to learn if someone else saw the same object.

camera: fuji s100, 12 megapixels. setting for all four photos: automatic. i have saved all four original photos.
content.summary: Don't know; noticed object in photo when transferring photos from camera to computer a few hours after i shot them.

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday
this is what happened...I took tylenol pm went to sleep, i couldn't tell you exactly the time maybe around 3:15am and some kind of movement inside the bedroom made me open my eyes, i saw a small figure, light grey color around 3 ft tall and very skinny, he was holding a light not a candle more like a long stick with a small flame and he was running out of bedroom to the hall next to the bathroom, i couldn't believe it so i closed and open my eyes several times and got to the conclusion that i was dreaming or maybe the effect of the pm tylennol and decided to sleep again.
around 15 minutes later or maybe 25 minutes i heard some voices out in the living room, voices in echo like when you go to a funeral and everybody talks whispering to each other but loud enough that if you are sleeping the only thing you can hear is their voices without understanding any word they are saying, after this voices i went to sleep again thinking it was a nightmare.  minutes later some movement inside the closet made me open my eyes again, i saw 2 little people like i described above, they were both playing with the fire stick and they seemed to enjoy whatever game they were playing, i felt very scared and tried not open my eyes so much just in case they noticed i was watching them, but again i felt it was a nightmare because my body felt wet from sweat and paralized.
at  5:45am my boyfriend left the house for work and before he left i remembered i asked him to leave the light in the hallway on. i was scared but had no time to tell him about the crazy dreams.
after work came home and took a shower i was looking all over my body for some clues but found nothing i even told my boyfriend to check my right ear because was hurting a little he said i had something like a pimple but that was it.
two days later came from work around 5pm and the tv was off, when i noticed the  tv screen inmediately asked my boyfriend if he was playing with my head because until this day i think i'm crazy just by think something so different and unknown can happen to me, but he told me no, i do believe his word.
then we took the picture.
       
              margaret believe me, until this day i got to the conclusion that i was dreaming but how can i explain the tv screen? i told bruce i have no reason to lie and if the rest of the world thinks i'm making this up, that's fine with me, i believe in myself and have no reason to lie.
 
i hope i did not bored you with my story, maybe one day we can meet and hopefully i can explained myself better.
 
thanks,
ana
content.summary: Small entities with light sticks; prints on tv screen

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to smoke a cig at 9:45 pm.  the first thing i noticed was a bright orange light, not super bright, just like a really bright star, but brighter than any star out.  this was southeast of my house.  at first i thought it was mars.  it acended slowly for about 7 minutes, but not very high.  i went inside to get my binoculars, got it focused in on the object.  there was a light on each side.  i watched for 10 seconds in the binoculars, then the lights quickly faded.  it didn't go behind clouds, as other stars were still visible in that direction.  then nothing.  it was 10:05 when it was over and done.  

did anyone else report this object?
content.summary: Strange light se of my house (address above)

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to say farewell to some friends. looked up, per usual, the fast pulsating star-like objects were in the sky again. i was beginning to think maybe i was just seeing alot of helicopter traffic, that's when i saw one of the objects stop dead in it's tracks & speed off back in the direction it came from to avoid an actual helicopter. on monday evening the objects were in the sky flying low & slow. i went to the right side of my house, by the garage, and noticed a very low flying bright light flying towards the house. as the object approached (about a 3 block distance away) it changed from the bright light into a triangle shape with red, green & white lights pulsating around the underbody of the object. the lights did not pulsate on & off from front to back like an airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: 3 nights in a row of sightings in bucks county
